column4: hello, has anything with the fonts changed in gutsy? It looks like the font from fedora 7, gnome.... it looks really nice. Not sure how to explain, but the fonts are bigger, and more smooth?
you can change the font in system > preferences > fonts
ok thanks, but I was talking about default fonts, looks the same on every screenshot I've seen from previews :)
yeah you can change the default font in that font dialog.
